title: Flight Simulator 2020 - MSFS Update - Weather - requesting METAR info
description:
Yesterday Asobo released Sim Update VII and as part of this update the weather app received an update which allows you to pull the latest METAR data in MSFS 2020. In this video we will have a look at the tool and discuss what the output means.
